author: Gigi Sukin
title: Michael Cohen will be released from prison early due to coronavirus
description: President Trump's former personal lawyer — and longtime fixer — Michael Cohen will be released from prison to serve the remainder of his three-year sentence in home confinement due to coronavirus concerns, CNN first reported and Cohen's lawyer Lanny Davis con…
content: President Trump's former personal lawyer and longtime fixer Michael Cohen will be released from prison to serve the remainder of his three-year sentence in home confinement due to coronavirus concerns, CNN first reported and Cohen's lawyer Lanny Davis confirm… [+776 chars]
